task.title: Open Report Outline
task.shortdesc: Open a previously saved report design for use during a current report.

step.cmd: Click the Open report design... button above the Report Outline.
step.stepresult: This will open a Browse window.

step.cmd: Locate and select the desired report design and click Open.
step.stepresult: The selected report design will be loaded into the Phon : Report window for use with the current query.
